title: Participatory Design-Based Language Learning Technology Development Project

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of fundamental language learning theories and educational technologies
context.additional_context: Learners primarily use smartphones as their main tool, focusing on developing technical solutions immediately applicable in real-world language learning contexts

learning_goals: Learners can explain a language learning skills design process based on learner needs.
Learners can develop a language learning application prototype using participatory design methods.
Learners can establish usability evaluation criteria for educational technology solutions in collaboration with diverse stakeholders.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
